Package ca.diro.DataBase.Command

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddEvent
    this command allow signed user to add an event in his account
    CancelEvent
    this class permit to set query in order to allow a signed user to cancel event
    CloseSession
    this class close an user's session
    ComingEvent
    this command permit user to coming event
    Command
    This Abstract class allowing to create and encapsulate query that has to be executed on the database using inheritance to implement specific query on subclass
    CommentEvent
    this class permit to set query in order to allow an signed user to comment event
    CreateUserAccount
    Command to create User Account using data from user
    DeleteEvent
    this class permit to set query in order to allow a signed user to delete event
    EditEvent
    this class permit to set query in order to allow an signed user to edit event
    ListCancelledEvent
    Command to see the list of all cancelled events
    ListEventByUser
    this class implement command to view all events that one user has created
    ListEventComing
    Command for getting coming event with available places
    ListPassedEvent
    THis class implement the Command to see passed events and the number of people attended
    ListRegisterEvent
    Command to see all event where a signed user is subscripted
    ModifyAccount
    this class implement command to allow logged user to modified their account informations parameter except the user's name
    NotifyCancelledEvent
    this class make command to notify users subscripted in an event when cancelled
    OpenSession
    this this make command permitting user to open a session
    PageInfoUser
    this command class give information on a user that can be use to generate user's own page
    ResearchEvent
    This class run build query for searching event using events at title and description as criteria
    SubscribeToEvent
    This class implement a command allowing anonymous user to subscribe in one event
